Meteara was caught by surprise. She didn't expect so much cooperation 
from this bot. She thought for a moment.

Meteara: I want to talk with this Talos about my mission. You will 
have to go alone for now, but I will join you soon. (She hands over a 
small datachip.) Go to these coordinates. This should be in a shallow 
lake, in a rocky area. I would like you to check the zone and install 
a surveillance circuit. I will tell you why a little later. Now go, 
Cybertronian Firaxis, and keep yourself from harm.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        He nods gravely.  "I am at your service m'lady."  He executes 
a very 
> precise and formal bow.  "What is thy bidding?"  He drops to one 
knee and 
> keeps his head down.
